title: Elf
content:
e Racial Speed: Move up to 9m per turn. Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12m. Elven Weapon Training: Proficiency with the Longsword, Shortsword, Shortbow, and Longbow. Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep. Keen Senses: Proficiency in the Perception skill.

BG3 Elf Subraces

High Elf: Cantrip: Know one Cantrip of your choice from the Wizard spell list using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability. Wood Elf: Fleet of Foot: Move up to 10
